ValidationRule.description: Requires PCL when the user selects 'Competitor' as the lost reason.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost"), ISPICKVAL(Lost_Reason__c, "Lost to Competitor"), ISBLANK(TEXT(Primary_Competitor_List__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have selected 'Competitor' as the Lost Reason. Please select an option in the 'Primary Competitor List' field.
